trans-unit.source: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Exibe uma coleção de designers de atividade filho em uma faixa de visualização e, quando um designer filho é selecionado na faixa de visualização, exibe o designer de atividade selecionado no modo de edição ou visualização em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> é um designer de atividades sequenciais que exibe todos os seus criadores de atividade filho em uma faixa que aparece na parte superior de sua superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip.
trans-unit.target: Quando um dos designers filho é selecionado, sua representação é exibida em uma janela de visualização que o designer de atividade de visualização hospeda abaixo a faixa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> has a preview mode and an edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> tem um modo de visualização e um modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Modo de visualização permite que o usuário exibir a representação inteira do designer selecionado sem fazer rolagem; No entanto, o modo de visualização não permitir ao usuário modificar o designer de atividade selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Modo de edição permite que o usuário modifique o designer de atividade selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that allows the designer to adjust its UI for users with disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que permite que o designer ajuste sua interface do usuário para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that allows the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> to adjust its UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que permite que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> para ajustar sua interface de usuário para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor inicial de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activity designers that are displayed by the activity preview designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de designers de atividade que são exibidos pelo designer de visualização de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> read-only collection that contains the designers displayed by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> coleção somente leitura que contém os designers exibidos pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do destino de soltar atual na matriz de destinos de soltar retornado por <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets(System.Drawing.Point)" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o índice do destino de soltar atual para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.CurrentDropTarget%2A> set operation sets the target in the preview strip that appears at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.CurrentDropTarget%2A> operação set define o destino na faixa de visualização que aparece na parte superior do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release the managed resources; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar os recursos gerenciados, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> para o qual garantir visibilidade na área de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o designer de atividade especificado está visível na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> verifies that all activity designers in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, and their children, are displayed in the preview strip at the top of the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner%2A> verifica se todos os designers de atividade no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, e seus filhos são exibidos na faixa de visualização na parte superior do designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> will return the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> não contêm referências nulas (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> retornará o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property contains a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> will return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> propriedade contém uma referência nula (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> retornará o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associada com o designer primeiro no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que delimitam os conectores do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that defines the bounds of all connectors in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites de todos os conectores no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> returns an empty array if one or more of the following conditions occur:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> Retorna uma matriz vazia se ocorrerem uma ou mais das seguintes condições:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not the active designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> não é o designer ativo na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> does not contain any child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> não contém qualquer designer de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> não estiver expandida na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que define as coordenadas x e y para a reprodução automática.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que representam os locais de destino válidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os locais de destino válidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If `dropPoint` is in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets%2A> returns the possible drop targets in the strip.
trans-unit.target: Se `dropPoint` está no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> faixa de visualização, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets%2A> retorna os destinos possíveis drop na faixa.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual na ordem da navegação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that specifies the direction in which designer navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que especifica a direção na qual a navegação do designer ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follow <paramref name="obj" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Object" /> selecionável que segue o <paramref name="obj" /> na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Since users can only navigate horizontally in the preview pane of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetNextSelectableObject%2A> only recognizes <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection.Left> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection.Right>.
trans-unit.target: Desde que os usuários só podem navegar horizontalmente no painel de visualização do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetNextSelectableObject%2A> reconhece apenas <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection.Left> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection.Right>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de glifos que estão associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> read-only collection that contains the glyphs associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> coleção somente leitura que contém os glifos associados a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Glyphs%2A> contains the collection of glyphs to display in the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Glyphs%2A> contém a coleção de glifos para exibir na faixa de visualização na parte superior do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a ser exibido quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> não contém nenhum outro designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto a ser exibido na superfície do designer

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.HelpText%2A> set operation adds text to the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.HelpText%2A> operação adiciona texto para a faixa de visualização na parte superior a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contém as coordenadas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho da qual coletar informações.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> nas coordenadas especificadas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> nas coordenadas especificadas

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> for which to initialize the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> para a qual inicializar o designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer used by the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer usado pela atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: This sets up listening to the selection change event for the activity designer associated with `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Isso configura o escuta o evento de alteração de seleção para o designer de atividade associado `activity`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activity designer is visible in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o designer de atividade especificado está visível no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> estiver visível, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is `true` and the preview window is set to preview mode, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.IsContainedDesignerVisible%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> é `true` e a janela de visualização é definida como modo de visualização <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.IsContainedDesignerVisible%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="containedDesigner" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> não contêm referências nulas (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the last designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> contém uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associados com o designer na última o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryReader" /> usado para restaurar o estado de exibição do designer.

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado de exibição do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The designer host associated with the designer is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: O host de designer associado ao designer é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização do designer em coordenadas lógicas na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that contains the x- and y-coordinates associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que contém a x-y coordenadas e associada a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Location%2A> set operation updates the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and all child designers it contains.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Location%2A> operação atualiza o local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> e todos os designers de filho que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the number of activities contained in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer de que o número de atividades contido no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: `listChangeArgs` contains the activity designers that have been added and removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: `listChangeArgs` contém os designers de atividade que foram adicionados e removidos do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanged%2A> updates the designer verbs associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and modifies the designer layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnContainedActivitiesChanged%2A> atualiza os verbos do designer associados a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> e modifica o layout do designer na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listChangeArgs" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário entra nos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> quando uma operação de arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers filho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais nos designers contidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as novas configurações de tamanho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> determines the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip that displays the collection of child activity designers and the preview window that displays the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> Determina o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> visualizar faixa que exibe a coleção de designers de atividade filho e a janela de visualização que exibe o designer de atividade selecionada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> also determines the size of the preview window depending on whether the designer is in edit or preview mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> também determina o tamanho da janela de visualização, dependendo se o designer estiver no modo de edição ou visualização.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> returns `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> returns the base implementation inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> retorna `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnLayoutSize%2A> retorna a implementação base herdada de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> when the user double-clicks on the surface of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> quando o usuário clica duas vezes na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When the user double-clicks in the preview window <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> enables edit mode on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário clica duas vezes na janela de visualização <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> habilita o modo de edição no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> when the user presses the mouse button down while the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> quando o usuário pressiona o botão do mouse enquanto o ponteiro está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: If the user presses the mouse button down while the cursor is in the preview window, edit mode is turned on for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se o usuário pressionar o botão do mouse pressionado enquanto o cursor estiver na janela de visualização, o modo de edição é ativado para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user moves the mouse cursor out of designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando o usuário move o cursor do mouse para fora dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user releases the mouse button in the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando o usuário solta o botão do mouse nos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the mouse button over the preview strip, the scrollable button changes to a minimum scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário libera o botão do mouse sobre a faixa de visualização, o botão rolável alterado para uma seta de rolagem mínima.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual da atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> que contém as configurações de propriedade do tema atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> que o tema associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> not only updates the theme property settings for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new settings to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.OnThemeChange%2A> não só atualiza as configurações de propriedade de tema para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, ele também processa as novas configurações para a janela de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer to preview in the preview section of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer para visualizar a seção de visualização do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to display in the preview section of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> para exibir na seção de visualização de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If no designer is selected in the preview strip section of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum designer está selecionado na seção de faixa de visualização do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Updates the configuration errors associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os erros de configuração associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.RefreshDesignerActions%2A> not only updates the actions associated with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new views to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.RefreshDesignerActions%2A> não só atualiza as ações associadas à <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, ele também processa os novos modos de exibição para a janela de visualização.

trans-unit.source: Updates the view displayed in the preview window of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a exibição na janela de visualização do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> must be set to `true` for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.RefreshPreview%2A> to perform view updates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> deve ser definido como `true` para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.RefreshPreview%2A> para executar atualizações do modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.BinaryWriter" /> para o qual o estado da exibição do designer atual é armazenado.

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado da exibição atual do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" /> em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.SaveViewState%2A> saves the currently selected activity designer in the preview strip and, if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> returns `true`, the contents of the preview window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.SaveViewState%2A> salva o designer de atividade selecionada atualmente na faixa de visualização e, se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> retorna `true`, o conteúdo da janela de visualização.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> contains null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the activity preview should be displayed in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a visualização da atividade deve ser exibida no designer.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the activity preview in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para exibir a visualização da atividade no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of verbs to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de verbos a serem associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> that contains the verbs associated with <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> que contém os verbos associados <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> property to insert custom verb actions for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> propriedade inserir ações verbo personalizado para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`.
trans-unit.target: O `CreateActivityVerbs` cria um novo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> chamado `"Add New Parallel Branch"` e associa um manipulador de eventos chamado `OnAddParallelBranch`.

trans-unit.source: When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o verbo for clicado no designer de fluxo de trabalho, o manipulador de eventos é chamado.
